name: THE WOOSTER GROUP / THE MOTHER / HELP!
blurb: Help The Wooster Group bring to life Brecht’s play The Mother (meant to incite social change) (and entertain at the same time).

name: All-Female Richard III
blurb: A ground breaking production to empower, inform and entertain new audiences, shake stuff up and inspire change. Who holds the power?

profile.name: Omidaze Productions All-Female Richard III
profile.blurb: Romeo & Juliet - the third & final part of our Shakespeare trilogy tours Wales in Spring 2017. Continuing to empower, inform and entertain new audiences, shake stuff up and inspire change thanks to 172 backers. www.omidaze.co.uk

name: Joan Didion's THE WHITE ALBUM
blurb: Riotous performance featuring this seminal essay as a portal between the progressive & violent legacies of the late 1960’s and today

profile.name: Joan Didion's THE WHITE ALBUM
profile.blurb: We may have missed you during our campaign, but tax-deductible donations can still be made to help bring this project to life!

name: GODS OF THE PRAIRIE: a mythical midwestern musical

name: Sweet & Lucky
blurb: An immersive theatre experience. A speakeasy antique shop.     A labyrinth of devotion, passion, and remembrance.

profile.name: Sweet & Lucky

An immersive theatre experience. A speakeasy antique shop.     A labyrinth of devotion, passion, and remembrance.
Sweet & Lucky closed in August, 2016. Thank you to all our fans!
